languages.text: Inflicts Melting 3 for 2 rounds on hit

traits.locale_text: Inflicts Melting 3 for 2 rounds on hit

languages.text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this weapon inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The wielder can perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shots{/g} with this weapon. It is considered a sniper rifle.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時、この武器は{g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}溶解{/g}効果を2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+3スタック付与する。
使用者はこの武器で{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}を行うことができ、この武器はスナイパーライフルとして扱われる。
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this weapon inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時、この武器は{g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}溶解{/g}効果を2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+3スタック付与する。
使用者はこの武器で{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}を行うことができ、この武器はスナイパーライフルとして扱われる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Попадание{/g} из этого оружия накладывает на цель 3 уровня {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}плавления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Персонаж может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельные{/g} выстрелы из этого оружия. Оно считается снайперской винтовкой.

languages.text: Diese Waffe bewirkt mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang +3 Stapel des {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}Schmelzen{/g}-Effektes. Der Träger kann mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}treffsichere Schüsse {/g} ausführen. Sie wird als Scharfschützengewehr behandelt.
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this weapon inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The wielder can perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shots{/g} with this weapon. It is considered a sniper rifle.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe bewirkt mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang +3 Stapel des {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}Schmelzen{/g}-Effektes. Der Träger kann mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}treffsichere Schüsse {/g} ausführen. Sie wird als Scharfschützengewehr behandelt.

languages.text: Bu silah, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} hâlinde +3 {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}eritme{/g} etkisi birikimi oluşturur. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Kullanan kişi, bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}hassas atışlar{/g} yapabilir. Silah, nişancı tüfeği olarak kabul edilir.
languages.original_text: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this weapon inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The wielder can perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shots{/g} with this weapon. It is considered a sniper rifle.

traits.locale_text: Bu silah, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} hâlinde +3 {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}eritme{/g} etkisi birikimi oluşturur. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Kullanan kişi, bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}hassas atışlar{/g} yapabilir. Silah, nişancı tüfeği olarak kabul edilir.

languages.text: Lorsque cette arme {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, elle applique 3 cumuls de l'effet {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}Fusion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Le porteur de cette arme peut effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}tirs de précision{/g}. Cette arme est considérée comme un fusil de sniper.

languages.text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, esta arma inflige +3 acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}derretimiento{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. El usuario puede efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparos certeros{/g} con esta arma. Se considera un rifle de francotirador.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，对目标施加3层{g|f:ac9bf532d765438299412b2158ce8953}熔化{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。装备者可以使用这把武器进行{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}，这把武器视为狙击步枪。
